modShortDescription: With this 7 Days to Die mod allows all weapons and tools will now break if not repaired. Will destroy mods so be careful.
modDescription:
With this 7 Days to Die mod allows all [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) and [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) will now break if not repaired. Will destroy mods so be careful.

[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_ToolsWeaponsBreak)

If you appreciate JaxTeller718’s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8098-jaxteller718-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
